sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content-submission', standalone: true, imports: [ ReactiveFormsModule ], templateUrl: './content-submission.component.html', styleUrl: './content-submission.component.scss' }) export class ContentSubmissionComponent { contentForm : FormGroup constructor() { } callSubmitContentApi() { } }
